summary: Literature review on ECM - key paper Bhattacherjee 2001
detailedReflection: Spent the morning understanding the Expectation-Confirmation Model. The key insight is that post-adoption beliefs (especially PU) are shaped by confirmation, not just pre-adoption expectations. This differentiates ECM from TAM.
Discussed narrowing the research scope. Supervisor suggested focusing on continuance rather than adoption. Need to update RQ and literature matrix.

summary: Draft survey instrument - PU and Sat items
detailedReflection: Adapted Davis (1989) PU scale and Oliver-derived satisfaction items. Considering whether to use 5-point or 7-point Likert. Literature suggests 7-point for more variance.
